SEARCH

Package vending

package vending
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractVendingMachine
    The AbstractVendingMachine class represents an abstract vending machine with basic functionality for managing balance and vending products.
    CoffeeMachine
    The CoffeeMachine class represents a Coffee Machine, extending an abstract Vending Machine.
    ExceededCapacityException
    Represents an exception thrown when the capacity of a vending machine is exceeded.
    InsufficientBalanceException
    Represents an exception thrown when there is insufficient balance in a vending machine.
    InsufficientResourceException
    Represents an exception thrown when there are insufficient resources to perform an operation in a vending machine.
    OutOfStockException
    Represents an exception thrown when a vending machine is out of stock.
    SnackMachine
    The SnackMachine class represents a Snack Machine, extending an abstract Vending Machine.
    VendingException
    Represents a generic exception that can occur in a vending machine.
